item.title: Pickup wont let me pickup up silab
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

replace yours with this one

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Invalid ID. Try ::pickup ##### #! "); } }

item.title: Pickup wont let me pickup up silab
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

ok when i try to pickup a gs it wont let me idk y everything is right in my code it just wont let mepickup up above 4 digits

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }[/code]
